body_html: In the event that it's helpful, I installed the latest version of Hashcat (as I knew it's benchmark capability could detect and use multiple GPU's). Hashcat was able to detect and use all 4 GPU's within the system at the same time (as observed by nvidia-smi), leading me to think that this is a TensorFlow issue, either due to TensorFlow itself, or due to some error I introduced during installation.

body: In the event that it's helpful, I installed the latest version of Hashcat (as I knew it's benchmark capability could detect and use multiple GPU's). Hashcat was able to detect and use all 4 GPU's within the system at the same time (as observed by nvidia-smi), leading me to think that this is a TensorFlow issue, either due to TensorFlow itself, or due to some error I introduced during installation.
